item.description:
The Crystals and Gemstone Class will be taught by Stacey who has 25 years of experience working with crystals and gemstones.

The class will be from 1:00-3:00 pm on Sunday,  May 22nd.

Stacy will teach you to Open your Mind to feeling the energies of the Crystals. There will be an array of Stones, starting with Quartz Crystals.

The class will be $20.00 per person, please bring cash .

The 2nd class will be a continuation of the first, getting to know the Magickal and Healing energies of a variety of Stones, and will be scheduled for Sunday, June 5th- information will be coming soon :)
item.name: Crystals & Gemstones Class
